Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/International Women's Year, 1975
description: Episode of Series "Womanpower". Made in the International Women's Year, 1975, this film provides an overview of women politicians running for office in several South American countries. Also contains interviews with the general public about the attitudes towards women in politics. Narrated by Rita Moreno.
